controller

Class ViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Draw

    public class ViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Draw
    FXML Controller class for the Pattern Editor
    Author:
    Stian Reistad Rogeberg., Terje Leirvik., Robin Sean Aron David Lundh.

        public ViewController()

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method initializes the slider for setting the animation speed. It also creates a deafult 20x20 dynamic board. The fit to view button is set to true to fith the board to the screen. This method also binds the canvas size to the view, initializes keyboard shortcuts and sets the mouse events so that the user can draw on the board, resize it and move the board.

      • newGame

        public void newGame()
        This method is activated when the user clicks the new game choice in the view and opens a dialogbox where the user can set paramters for a new game. Then launches the new game.

      • loadBoard

        public void loadBoard()
        This method launches a FileChooser and lets the user select a file. If the file is not null it creates an object of type RLEDecoder and calls the method decode(). And starts a new game with the the selected pattern from file.
        See Also:
        RLEDecoder

      • saveBoardAsRLE

        public void saveBoardAsRLE()
        This method will save the board in the format .rle.
        See Also:
        FileSaver

      • saveBoardAsWAV

        public void saveBoardAsWAV()
        This method will save the current board as a .model.filemanagement.otherformats.wav representation when the user interacts with this function in the view.

      • saveBoardAsPNG

        public void saveBoardAsPNG()
        This method will save the current board as a .gif representation when the user interacts with this function in the view.

      • saveBoardAsGIF

        public void saveBoardAsGIF()
        This method will save the current board as a .gif representation when the user interacts with this function in the view.

      • closeApplication

        public void closeApplication()
        This method will close the application.

      • openPatternEditor

        public void openPatternEditor()
        This method opens the pattern editor when the user interacts with this function and pauses the animation of the current game.

      • initializeBindCanvasSize

        private void initializeBindCanvasSize()
        This method binds the canvas to the view.

      • update

        private void update()
        This method is called by a ScheduledService and calls other methods that are required
        First we call fitToView() (if the Fit To View ToggleButton is selected ) to resize the board and position it on the center of the Canvas. Then we call GameOfLife.updateWithThreads() ()} to run the algorithm and lastly we call draw() to redraw the Canvas

      • initializeScheduledService

        private void initializeScheduledService()

      • setStatusBarText

        public void setStatusBarText(java.lang.String s)

      • initializeKeyboardShortcuts

        private void initializeKeyboardShortcuts()
        This method initializes keyboard shortcuts.

      • setColors

        public void setColors(javafx.scene.paint.Color[] colors)
        This method sets the four colors used when drawing the game;
        • Background color
        • Dead cell color
        • Alive cell color
        • Grid color
        Parameters:
        colors - The board colors
        See Also:
        Color

      • getColors
